title: Crypto Frauds Target Ukrainian Donations
sub_head: Some schemes launched in wake of Russian invasion try to trick donors into sending crypto to fraudsters, research firm says
body:
Cryptocurrency frauds are trying to take advantage of an outpouring of support for Ukraine.
A number of schemes launched in the wake of Russiaâ€™s invasion have tried to trick donors into sending crypto to fraudsters, research firm Elliptic said. The largest is a scam cryptocurrency whose value has risen to about $50 million, the firm said, even after it was exposed as a fake.
